Package de.chojo.sadu.wrapper.stage

Interface ConfigurationStage<T>

Type Parameters:
T - result type
All Known Implementing Classes:
QueryBuilder
public interface ConfigurationStage<T>
Represents a ConfigurationStage of a QueryBuilder.

Allows to configure the QueryBuilderConfig. This stage can be skipped when using a QueryFactory.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default QueryStage<T> configure​(QueryBuilderConfig config)
    Configure the query builder.
    QueryStage<T> configure​(AtomicReference<QueryBuilderConfig> config)
    Configure the query builder.
    QueryStage<T> defaultConfig()
    Set the settings to default values.
    QueryStage<T> defaultConfig​(Consumer<QueryBuilderConfig.Builder> builderModifier)
    Allows to modify a config, pre-populated with the default values defined via QueryBuilderConfig.setDefault(QueryBuilderConfig)

  • Method Details

    • configure

      @CheckReturnValue default QueryStage<T> configure​(QueryBuilderConfig config)
      Configure the query builder.

      A configured QueryFactory can be used to skip this step.

      Parameters:
      config - The config of the QueryBuilder
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in QueryStage with the config set.

    • configure

      @CheckReturnValue QueryStage<T> configure​(AtomicReference<QueryBuilderConfig> config)
      Configure the query builder.

      A configured QueryFactory can be used to skip this step.

      Parameters:
      config - The config of the QueryBuilder
      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in QueryStage with the config set.

    • defaultConfig

      @CheckReturnValue QueryStage<T> defaultConfig()
      Set the settings to default values.

      Default will be atomic transactions and not throwing any exception.

      A configured QueryFactory can be used to skip this step.

      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in QueryStage with the config set.

    • defaultConfig

      @CheckReturnValue QueryStage<T> defaultConfig​(Consumer<QueryBuilderConfig.Builder> builderModifier)
      Allows to modify a config, pre-populated with the default values defined via QueryBuilderConfig.setDefault(QueryBuilderConfig)

      A configured QueryFactory can be used to skip this step.

      Returns:
      The QueryBuilder in QueryStage with the config set.
